name: 炸弹狂欢
description:
It is said that there is a secret hidden in Level-8. Some say that there are countless rarities, some say that a terrible demon is imprisoned there, others say that it is nothing but a void. There has never been evidence of anything hidden in Level-8, because no one who has been there has ever returned.
Of course, they could have died on other levels, and it's all just a myth.
You take on the role of one of four optional characters as you embark on an adventure to Level-8, either alone or with your AI teammates, exploring one weird and thrilling Level after another, battling a plethora of enemies and assorted monsters, and trying to survive the roar of bomb blasts.
Using the combination of Roguelike and bomb-man game elements, the game scene is presented to the player in a completely 3D screen. Each time the player goes on an adventure, the scene will be different.

Note: There are no ads of any kind, and the content is completely free
